amendment.description: Amendment gives additional priority for training services to single parents, displaced homemakers, and pregnant single women.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 108-92 to clarify the definition of eligible populations for job training services to include single parents, displaced homemakers, and pregnant single women.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Millender-McDonald.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
